formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: I want to talk to an agent

Agent: I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent. Let me connect you right away. Please hold for a moment. ||TRANSFER||

Customer: hello hello

Agent: I'm here to help. It seems like we got a bit disconnected. You wanted to speak with a human agent, right? I'm going to go ahead and transfer the call. Please hold for just a moment. ||TRANSFER||
